backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a footer update and listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-generated summaries of many frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root element, and loading the React application.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawling and pointing to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap defining URLs, priorities, and update frequencies for the site’s pages and tools.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with layout, navigation, SEO hooks, and routes for all pages and tools.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: No-op ad placeholder component that intentionally renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a friendly error alert with a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/tools/LoadingInd: Small loading indicator component with a spinner and optional text.
frontend/src/components/tools/RelatedToo: Component showing a grid of related tools based on the current tool’s type.
Reusable layout wrapper for tool pages handling inputs, actions, loading, results, and downloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with global styles for typography and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the platform’s mission and offerings using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/AllToolsPage.tsx: Lists all available PDF, image, and calculator tools in a grid with icons and links.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of various calculator tools with icons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information and support details inside styled card sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero section, tool category links, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ImageToolsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of image-related tools such as compression, resizing, and format conversion.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a styled 404 page with navigation buttons to the homepage and tools list.
frontend/src/pages/PdfToolsPage.tsx: Renders a grid of PDF-related tool cards linking to merge, split, compress, and conversion tools.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Shows the site's privacy policy with sections on data use, file security, cookies, and policy updates.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays terms of service covering agreements, usage rules, warranties, liability, and updates.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Age: Provides an age calculator using a birth date input and shows years, months, and days with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Bmi: Implements a BMI calculator with height/weight inputs and displays BMI value and category.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Emi: Calculates loan EMI, total payment, and interest from user inputs and displays formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Gst: React page for calculating GST by adding or removing tax, displaying GST amount and totals.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Loa: Loan calculator page computing monthly payments, total payment, and interest based on inputs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Per: Percentage tool providing percentage-of and percentage-change calculations with tabbed UI.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Sip: SIP calculator computing maturity value, invested amount, and gains from monthly investments.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageComp: Image compressor allowing users to upload, compress, preview size reduction, and download images.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageConv: Image converter enabling format conversion between JPEG, PNG, and WebP with download support.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageResi: Provides an interface to resize an image with optional aspect‑ratio preservation and download the result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/JpgToPngP: Allows users to upload a JPG/JPEG image, convert it to PNG, and download the converted file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/PngToJpgP: Lets users upload a PNG image, convert it to JPG, and download the processed output.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/CompressPdf: Enables uploading a PDF, compressing it via a utility function, and downloading the compressed file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/ImageToPdfP: Converts one or more uploaded images into a single PDF and provides a download option.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/JpgToPdfPag: Creates a PDF from uploaded JPG/JPEG images with demo‑mode limitations and supports downloading the generated file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfMergePag: UI page for merging multiple PDF files using mergePdfs and providing download of the merged result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfSplitPag: UI page for selecting a PDF and extracting a page range using splitPdf, then downloading the split file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfToImageP: UI page for converting a PDF into images via pdfToImage and downloading the generated ZIP.
frontend/src/routes.ts: Defines all application route constants for navigation across tool categories and pages.
frontend/src/utils/calculators.ts: Provides calculation utilities for age, GST, EMI, loan, BMI, and related validation logic.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Utility functions to trigger blob downloads and generate timestamped filenames.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting helpers for bytes, numbers, and calculating percentage reduction.
frontend/src/utils/image.ts: Image utilities for loading, compressing, resizing, and converting between JPG/PNG formats.
frontend/src/utils/pdf.ts: Provides demo placeholder implementations for PDF creation, merging, splitting, compression, and PDF-to-image conversion using simulated blobs.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Defines and applies SEO titles and meta descriptions for home, default, and tool-specific routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom theming, colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
frontend/VERIFICATION_CHECKLIST.md: Documentation checklist verifying required tool URLs, SEO behavior, and SPA routing correctness.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, feature requests, and versioned state for managing the footer branding update task.
